sentences.sentence: At dawn, a villager walked clockwise around a white stupa, set high up over the valley.
sentences.translation: 黎明时，一位村民顺时针绕着一座高悬在山谷上空的白塔走。

sentences.sentence: Li Guoqing, a sixty-year-old villager says, "Thanks to the government, great changes have taken place in the countryside."
sentences.translation: 60岁的村民李国庆说：“多亏了政府，农村发生了巨大的变化。”

sentences.sentence: The villager is convinced that those foreign tourists will turn back because that road is being repaired.
sentences.translation: 村民相信那些外国游客会回来，因为那条道路正在修理之中。
